question:
Which one of the following Prime Ministers of India had visited Pakistan?
1. Atal Bihari Vajpayee
2. Rajiv Gandhi
3. Indira Gandhi
4. Jawaharlal Nehru
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: So far only three Prime Ministers of India viz., Jawaharlal Nehru, Rajiv Gandhi and Atal Bihari Vajpayee visited Pakistan. Narendra Modi, when he visits Islamabad to attend the 19th SAARC summit in 2016, will be only the fourth Indian PM to visit Pakistan.
